segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see the sink overflow unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed, missing the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Soon the whole floor will be soaked and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he could get really hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting below adds to the worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids wanting cookies, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden view feels distant from this tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the mom; she'll be upset later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked high, water ruining everything slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene turned perilous makes me melancholic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one's aware; it's a quiet tragedy building.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
